main.name: Aaron Wesolek
main.description: I am an aspiring web development engineer.  If you would like to learn more about me, please check out this page and feel free to contact me
main.bio: I am currently learning Full Stack Web Development from Lambda School.  I can develop web pages in HTML, CSS (css less) JavaScript, ReactJS, and NodeJS

education.degree: Bachelor's of Science in Food Industry Management

education.description: HTML, CSS, CSS Less, JavaScript, and React.  Will be learning Python.

work.title: Document Scanner
work.description: I was a high-performance employee, scanning documents into the cloud for a VA contracted company. I scanned a total of 35 to 40 thousand documents each shift, trained new employees on the scanning machines and indexed the boxes onto the ORCA Scanning database.

work.title: Co-Owner
work.description: I was responsible for day-to-day business operations, training new employees, managing supplies, and speaking with customers. Had to work with a tight budget and timeline, while keeping constant contact with the customers.

projects.title: Spotiy Song Suggestor Marketing Page
